name: Somm - BDX - Robusto
maker: Fabrica Centroamericana de Tabaco S. A.
additionalNotes: Somm Cigars, a new company founded by Vlada S., is based on his extensive experience as a sommelier in the wine industry and his participation of a decade in the cigar business. The brand has a wide variety of flavors and aromas that satisfy even the most complicated consumer.
